mapper.select: Select User.Id, User.Phone, User.YearGraduate, User.Period, User.FirstName, User.LastName, User.Email, User.CellPhone, User.BirthDate, Rol.Id as rl_Id, Rol.Name as rl_Name, Program.Id as pr_Id, Program.Duration as pr_Duration, Program.Name as pr_Name From User, Request, Rol, Program Where Request.User_Id = User.Id And User.Program_Id = Program.Id And User.Rol_Id = Rol.Id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (Id, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, CellPhone, Program_Id, YearGraduate, BirthDate, Period, Rol_Id) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{user.firstName}, #{user.lastName}, #{user.email},#{user.phone},#{user.cellphone}, #{user.program.id},#{user.yearGraduate},#{user.birthDate},#{user.period},#{user.role.id})
